Description: All users and hardware must be licensed; annual fees for user ($100) and hardware ($200); data transmission requires additional paid service; unauthorized use is criminal offense
Penalty/Effect: Lethal Black ICE deployment, criminal status, can be marked as a national security threat
Circumvention_Method: Use unlicensed gear, run Patchwerk utility to reconstruct files after data defeaters; Difficult Interface or Arcane check to maintain netrun under disruption
Special_Notes: Data-defeaters disrupt unlicensed or illicit runs, especially in hostile cities

Description: All non-government/military/corp net traffic must be unencoded; password protection allowed for basic privacy
Penalty/Effect: Carrying or using encrypted data marks user as traitor/spy, subject to lethal response
Special_Notes: Corp data is always encoded in-house; possession of encrypted data outside official use is itself a crime

Description: All legal computers must have a government-accessible Clipper chip (code-breaking backdoor); felony to operate unregistered or modified systems
Penalty/Effect: Felony charge, immediate system seizure and prosecution
Circumvention_Method: Average Kitbash check to remove; illicit systems must avoid inspection
Special_Notes: Clipper chips allow direct surveillance/decryption by state

Description: Random line noise disrupts unauthorized net/data use in certain cities, making netrunning or illegal data transfer unreliable
Penalty/Effect: Prevents netrunning, data loss, criminal penalties for circumvention
Circumvention_Method: Patchwerk utility to reconstruct data dumps; Difficult Interface or Arcane check to maintain netrun
Special_Notes: Voice transmission unaffected; repeated attempts may still trigger detection/ICE

Description: Unauthorized access to restricted areas of Net (police, corp, etc.); equivalent of digital trespass
Penalty/Effect: Fine 50eb+, up to 5 years in Low Security Block
Circumvention_Method: Hacking, use of counter-security gear/ICE breakers
Special_Notes: Additional charges if crimes committed during run

Description: Erasure of SIN and skeleton from Net, making user a Blank (unperson)
Penalty/Effect: No rights, cannot hold jobs, accounts, access Net officially; severe penalties if caught as a Blank
Circumvention_Method: Buy from a “Shoemaker,” pass Streetdeal to secure; Falsification checks to avoid detection
Special_Notes: Referee rolls Reliability and Difficulty to spot fakes; permanent zeroing removes almost all legal status

Description: Physical and digital security tag required in restricted areas; AI/auto defenses fire immediately on unauthorized access
Penalty/Effect: Immediate deadly force, auto extension of sentence/instant execution
Circumvention_Method: Obtain/forge security tag, AI hacking, retinal scan spoofing
Special_Notes: System may allow transfer/upgrade of sentence by AI without court

Description: Passwords permitted for civilian privacy but do not constitute legal encryption; privacy is “illusory”
Penalty/Effect: No true privacy rights; easy government decryption of all net traffic
Special_Notes: Legal rationale: Net declared “national resource”; court challenges are moot

Description: Anti-trace system routes all ICE traces to a phantom (sacrificial) deck; delays or confuses active trace programs (e.g. Bloodhound)
Penalty/Effect: Delays/redirects tracing ICE, reduces speed of runner deck by -2
Circumvention_Method: Install shadowdeck, alter cell-deck priority; Difficult Cyberdeck Design roll
Special_Notes: All functions on phantom deck are inaccessible to netrunner; “phantom” absorbs trace/kill routines
